arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَسْئَلُكَ مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَسْئَلُكَ عَافِيَتِكَ فِيْ اُمُوْرِيْ كُلِّهَا
وَاَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ خِزْيِ الدُّنْيَا وَعَذَابَ الْآخِرَةِ
translation: O Allah, I beseech You for all the good
and I seek refuge in You from all the evil
O Allah I beseech You for well-being in all my affairs
and I seek refuge in You from the disgrace of the world and the heareafter
transliteration: allāhumma innī as-aluka min kulli khayr
allāhumma innī as-aluka `āfiyatika fī umūrī kullihā
wa-a`ūdhu bika min khizyid dunyā wa`adhābal-ākhirah
